input.sentences: after the sun set i decided to go out and grab some food .
there were a lot of big leaves on the trees that i passed by .
when i finally arrived at the restaurant i ordered a big plate of food .
i thought i was full but i was still hungry after a few minutes .
output.sentences: The helicopter took us over the sprawling lawn before dropping us at the gate.
The gate was surrounded by beautiful flowers and plants from all over the world.
Inside, we enjoyed an appetizer from the middle east.
I stuffed my face with the international delicacy
I couldn't stop taking pictures of my entree-it was so pretty.
